summary: MANUFACTURER RECALL NUMBER16S41  NHTSA RECALL NUMBER16V777  SUMMARY  ON CERTAIN VEHICLES, THE FUEL DELIVERY MODULE (FDM) MAY DEVELOP A CRACK IN THE VERTICAL PORTION OF THE FUEL SUPPLY PORT THAT COULD RESULT IN A FUEL LEAK.  SAFETY RISK  A FUEL LEAK IN THE PRESENCE OF AN IGNITION SOURCE MAY INCREASE THE RISK OF A FIRE.  MANUFACTURER HAS FAILED OR IS UNABLE TO REMEDY THIS SAFETY RECALL FOR YOUR VEHICLE IN A TIMELY MANNER,  RECALL STATUS RECALL INCOMPLETE, REMEDY NOT YET AVAILABLE    HAVE NOT BEEN NOTIFIED BY MANUFACTURE. DEALERSHIP HAS NOT BEEN CONTACTED. CONSUMER CONCERN:  VEHICLE FIRE.
